PushSubscriptionOptions.summary: The PushSubscriptionOptions interface of the represents the options associated with a push subscription.

remarks.para: The read-only PushSubscriptionOptions object is returned by calling on a . This interface has no constructor of its own.

PushSubscriptionOptionsApplicationServer.summary: The applicationServerKey read-only property of the interface contains the public key used by the push server.
PushSubscriptionOptionsApplicationServer.value: A public key your push server uses to send messages to client apps via a push server. This value is part of a signing key pair generated by your application server, and usable with elliptic curve digital signature (ECDSA), over the P-256 curve. If no applicationServerKey member is passed when initialized, it will be set to null.

PushSubscriptionOptionsUserVisibleOnly.summary: The userVisibleOnly read-only property of the interface indicates if the returned push subscription will only be used for messages whose effect is made visible to the user.
PushSubscriptionOptionsUserVisibleOnly.value: A boolean value that indicates whether the returned push subscription will only be used for messages whose effect is made visible to the user.
